alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Grant; Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:20AM CDT until June 21 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 820 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Anthony to 3 miles north of Manchester to 8 miles northeast of Amorita, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medford, Wakita, Manchester, Renfrow, and Waldron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
